posts.body:
>>f9af075f-7555-4274-91e6-282390f63244
BO, I think part of the solution is to allow "subscriptions" to moderators, or groups of moderators, who can create blacklists and mutelists at will, but also are simply optional. That way moderation can be done for free, but also doesn't become stifling and oppressive.

Imagine.

>picking your mods from a list.
>blacklisted post is still visible, but only barely - shoved off, out of the way, to the margins, shrunk down to almost nothing, and merged with consecutive blacklisted posts.
>Thumbnail is 50 pixels wide.
>Modmode, wherein blacklisting a post takes only one click, and it's easy.
>You can see which moderator snuffed what post.

Sorry if this turns out to be a duplicate post. I think my last post was never really published.
I can see it, but I don't know if you can.
>>29f7c198-06e4-418e-b50d-5815a5db8137
>test
copy that.

>>09622a60-9547-4811-b58f-f99a307e673a
>POW ID's
>Need to prove your worth by mining an ID.
>ID mining takes however long people want it to, so you can crank it up to double or triple the difficulty when the spam starts to flow.

The only problem is that people with shitbox computers will have a hard time earning the rights to post, but nobody cares about Brazilian 12 year olds, and chinamen anyways.

>>09ac6071-759e-4861-9a69-49406d08760d
Boys, the admin has disabled posting without a ZEROID.

If you make posts without a ZEROID, they are only visible to you. Go to the thread below to find out how to post.
